name: Desktop Blackjack
description:
Blackjack, plain and simple.

Easy to learn, hard to master; try to reach a total hand score at or near 21 to beat out the house. The game saves your total cash on exit, so you can return later to win even bigger! If you do go broke, don't worry. This casino lets you play with credit (at a limited betting price, of course). 

This game is still in development, but is currently fully operational. Expect quality of life updates and perhaps some more in-depth functionalities in the future.
